property.name: Text
property.value: CREW ATTACHMENT Fate 1 Knack React: Tack Alesio’s Sacrifice after one of your Crew with an Influence cost greater than 3 is sunk. Place the Crew in your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play when you are entering a Boarding. Tack one of your Crew aligned to your Captain’s faction to untack your Captain if your Captain has the Heroic trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Holy Andare has +2 Influence and +1 Swashbuckling while you have one or more cards in play with the Oath trait.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Gosse's Gentlemen

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced • Unique • First Mate Heroic • Loyal • Swordsman +2 (Andre inflicts 2 extra hits during Boarding Attacks) Act: Tack Andre to suffer 2 fewer Hits from all cannon attacks (minimum 0) until the end of the turn.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Sea Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced • Unique • Loyal Glamour 2 React: Discard an Attachment attached to Benny when you are suffering Hits to reduce the Hits suffered by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: 1 Sea Away To Complete: Tack one of your Sorcerers with Porte of 1 or more. Crew Attachment • Porte 1 Knack: Act: Tack this Crew to target another player’s untacked, non-Captain Crew. Play a card out of your hand as a Boarding Attack to begin a Duel between this Crew and the target Crew.

property.name: Text
property.value: VESTEN CAPTAIN ATTACHMENT Patron • You may tack one of your Lærdom Sorcerers when attaching this card to your Captain to reduce the Influence cost of this card to 0. React: Tack this card when you inflict Hits on another Ship in this Sea. That Ship suffers 3 additional Hits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced • Unique Gunner Attachments which increase Cathwulf’s Cannon skill each provide an addtional +1 Cannon.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Gosse's Gentlemen

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced • Unique • Heroic Swordsman +1 (Connor inflicts 1 extra hit during Boarding Attacks) During a Boarding, Connor has a bonus to his Swashbuckling equal to the number of Crew on the other Ship with an Influence cost less than 3.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Sea Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Loyal • No Attachments Act: Tack and sink the Daring Fools to draw 2 cards from your deck. You may only use this ability if you have no cards in your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fear 1 Knack • Unique React: Target one of your Crew with Fear of 1 or more instead of performing a Boarding Attack. All of your Crew inflict extra Hits equal to the targeted Crew’s Fear level during Boarding Attacks. In addition, your Crew with the Fear trait inflict an additional number of Hits during Boarding Attacks equal to their Fear level. These effects last until the end of the Boarding.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may not play this card if you have a Villainous Captain. React: Play when your Captain tacks to produce skill points. Your Captain produces extra skill points equal to the number of Loyal Crew you have on Board.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play when you are paying Swashbuckling. Tack one of your Ally cards in this Sea to produce 4 Swashbuckling

property.name: Text
property.value: CREW ATTACHMENT Unique • Fear 2 Knack React: Sink this card when another player inflicts Hits on your Ship. Reduce the Hits to zero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target another player’s Ship in this Sea. That player must target one of his or her Crew. Target one of your Crew and play a card from your hand to begin a Duel between both of the targeted Crew. The Crew playing the final Boarding Attack in the Duel inflicts 4 extra Hits.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Explorer's Society

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced • Unique Loyal • Gunner You must discard the top card of your deck when Jack tacks to produce Cannon. If the Boarding Attack on the discard is a Slash, Jack produces 2 less Cannon (minimum 0).

property.value: Explorer's Society

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique • Heroic Your Captain has +1 Adventuring and +1 Influence while Franco is on board your Ship.

property.name: Text
property.value: CREW ATTACHMENT Fear 2 Knack Eye (A Crew may not have more than 1 Eye attachment) React: Tack this card when one of your other Crew tacks to produce skill points. That Crew produces extra skill points equal to this Crew’s Fear level.

property.name: Text
property.value: 1 Sea Away To Complete: Tack one of your Sorcerers with Pyeryem of 1 or more. Crew Attachment Pyeryem 1 Knack: React: Tack this card when this Crew tacks to absorb Hits during a Boarding. The other player in the Boarding must sink 2 cards from their hand.

property.value: Unique • Villainous • Loyal When hiring Friedrich, you may pay an additional 3 Influence to give him the trait: Fear 1 and +3 Swashbuckling until the end of the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heroic • Gunner Heinrich has +3 Cannon if another Ship in this Sea has a Sorcerer on Board.

property.name: Text
property.value: 1 Sea Away To Complete: Pay 5 Adventuring (3 if completed in the Forbidden Sea or if you have a Fate Sorcerer on Board) Crew Attachment (You may not attach this card to a Crew with the Fate trait): This Crew has the trait Fate 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: 1 Sea Away To Complete: Pay 5 Adventuring (3 if completed in Frothing Sea or if you have a Glamour Sorcerer on Board) Crew Attachment (You may not attach this card to a Crew with the Glamour trait): This Crew has the trait Glamour 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: 1 Sea Away To Complete: Pay 5 Adventuring (3 if completed in the Trade Sea or if you have a Lærdom Sorcerer on Board) Crew Attachment (You may not attach this card to a Crew with the Lærdom trait): This Crew has the trait Lærdom 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: 1 Sea Away To Complete: Pay 5 Adventuring (3 if completed in La Boca or if you have a Porte Sorcerer on Board) Crew Attachment (You may not attach this card to a Crew with the Porte trait): This Crew has the trait Porte 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: 1 Sea Away To Complete: Pay 5 Adventuring (3 if completed in The Mirror or if you have a Pyeryem Sorcerer on Board) Crew Attachment (You may not attach this card to a Crew with the Pyeryem trait): This Crew has the trait Pyeryem 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play this card when you are suffering Hits. Attach this card to your Ship as a Damage Attachment to absorb 4 Hits. While this card is attached you may not bring Crew cards into play. You may sink this Attachment by paying 4 Swashbuckling as an Action. You may not sink or discard this card with other card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gunner • Pyeryem 0

property.name: Text
property.value: Target and tack all Sorcery Knacks and non-Captain Sorcerers in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: All Captains are considered to have the following ability: Act: Once per turn, tack your Captain to search your deck for a card with the Oath trait. Show it to your opponent(s) and place it in your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play when you suffer Hits. Attach this card to one of your Villainous Crew without a Face attachment to absorb 2 Hits. This card has the Face trait, and gives the attached Crew the trait Fear 1. If the Crew already has the Fear trait, that Crew gains +1 to their Fear. A Crew may not have more than one Face attachment.

property.value: Gosse's Gentlemen

property.value: Experienced • Unique • Loyal First Mate • Pyeryem 2 When Korintine is Experienced or Hired you may search your deck and discard pile for an Attachment card that is a Pyeryem Knack, attach it to Korintine and then shuffle your deck.

property.value: React: Play when you are paying Adventuring. Tack one of your Ally cards in this Sea to produce 4 Adventuring

property.name: Text
property.value: CAPTAIN ATTACHMENT Unique Act: Tack this card to target another Ship in this Sea. If you are in your Captain’s Starting Sea, inflict 3 Hits on the target Ship.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique • Captive • Loyal When hiring Louis, you may pay an additional 3 Influence to give him +2 Sailing, +1 Swashbuckling and the Rower trait until the end of the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may only play this card if you have an untacked Villainous Captain. Search an opponent’s discard pile and target a Crew card in that discard pile. Place that Crew card in that player’s sunk pile. Until the end of the turn, any player placing a Crew card in the discard pile must place that Crew in the sunk pile instead. Sink this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique • Heroic • Loyal When hiring Miguel, you may pay an additional 3 Influence to give him +2 Sailing, +2 Adventuring and the Holy trait until the end of the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Loyal • No Attachments Swordsman +1 (The Musketeers inflict 1 extra hit during Boarding Attacks) Montaigne Musketeers may attach Swordsman Knacks.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move your Ship 2 Seas towards the Trade Sea (moving through each Sea, one at a time).

property.name: Text
property.value: Any player may sink this Chantey by paying 4 Influence as an action. Action cards are placed in the sunk pile instead of the discard pile after they have been canceled or resolved (except Action cards which become attachments).

property.name: Text
property.value: Move your Ship to any Sea with a Port card attached (moving through each Sea, one at a time).

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique • Heroic • Loyal When hiring Percival, you may pay an additional 3 Influence to give him the trait: Porte 1 and +2 Cannon until the end of the game.

property.value: Gosse's Gentlemen

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced • Unique Heroic • Swordsman +1 (Peter inflicts 2 extra hits during Boarding Attacks) React: Once per turn, when Peter is tacking to produce skill points, you may tack one of your other Crew to have Peter produce an extra 2 points of that skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target a Ship in an adjacent Sea. Move your Ship to that Sea and begin a Boarding with that Ship.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sink a Sorcery Knack attached to one of your Crew to untack that Crew. Sink this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: VILLAINOUS CREW ATTACHMENT Face (A Crew may not have more than 1 Face Attachment) React: Tack Reis’ Fury when this Crew inflicts Hits with a Boarding Attack. Heroic Crew may not tack to absorb these Hits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Instead of drawing three cards at the end of the turn, players must draw cards from their deck until they reach their maximum hand size. All Captains have the following ability: Act: Discard all cards in your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: 1 Sea Away To complete: Pay 4 Adventuring (3 if completed in The Mirror). Crew Attachment: This Crew absorbs 3 extra Hits when tacking to absorb Hits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Villainous Roald may not be part of your starting Crew unless you have a Villainous Captain. You may not hire Roald unless you have more than one Villainous Crew in play. When Roald tacks to absorb Hits he absorbs 1 extra Hit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced • Unique • Loyal Heroic Act: Tack Roberta to get an Adventure from your discard pile and put it into play, uncompleted. You may immediately move your Ship one Sea towards that Adventure.

property.name: Text
property.value: CREW ATTACHMENT Glamour 1 Knack React: Tack this card when this Crew or a card attached to this Crew inflicts Hits on another player’s Ship. The Ship suffers 3 additional Hits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced • Unique Swordsman +1 (Rosa inflicts 1 extra hit during Boarding Attacks) React: After you have reversed a Boarding Attack with any one of your Crew, tack Rosa to tack the opposing Crew involved in the Boarding Attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: THIS SEA ATTACHMENT Any player in this Sea may sink this Attachment by paying 3 Swashbuckling as an action. Players in this Sea during the untack phase must sink the top card of their deck and the top card of their discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Captive • Rower Sal has +2 Sailing if there is a Chantey in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique • 2 Seas Away To Complete: Pay 8 Adventuring (5 if your Ship’s printed crew maximum is less than 9). Artifact • Ship Attachment: React: Tack this card after you tack a Crew to produce Adventuring to complete an Adventure (not this one). Untack that Crew.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any player may, as an action, sink two of their Sorcery Knacks to sink this Chantey. Sorcery Knacks may not be untacked.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heroic When hiring Soren, you may pay 5 Swashbuckling to reduce his Influence cost to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move your Ship 2 Seas towards The Mirror (moving through each Sea, one at a time).

property.name: Text
property.value: CREW ATTACHMENT Pyeryem 1 Knack React: Tack this card when another player plays or performs an action that would create a Duel involving one of your Crew. That action is canceled.

property.name: Text
property.value: Weather Target a Ship in this Sea. Tack the target.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Gosse's Gentlemen

property.name: Text
property.value: Heroic • Swordsman +2 (Sylvia inflicts 2 extra hits during Boarding Attacks) Sylvia may attach cards as if she were Montaigne • When Sylvia comes into play, you may search your deck for a card with the title: “Montaigne Puzzle Sword" and attach it to Sylvia at no cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: HEROIC CREW ATTACHMENT Artifact • Hand (A Crew may not have more than 1 Hand Attachment) React: Tack this Crew when another player performs a React which cancels one of your Actions that will result in a Boarding. Cancel the React.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique • Gunner • Loyal When hiring Talia, you may pay an additional 3 Influence to give her the trait: Fate 1 and +2 Sailing until the end of the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any player may sink this Chantey by paying 6 Adventuring as an action. Players with a Ship in the Trade Sea may, as an action, pay their Ship’s Move Cost to move their Ship to The Mirror, and viceversa.

property.name: Text
property.value: CREW ATTACHMENT Unique • Lærdom 1 Knack React: Tack instead of performing a Boarding Attack. Target and tack a Crew on the other Ship with an Influence cost less than double this Crew’s Lærdom.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Gosse's Gentlemen

property.name: Text
property.value: Topman • Swordsman +2 (Dirk inflicts 2 extra hits during Boarding Attacks) React: Discard a card from your hand after Dirk has played a Boarding Attack. Change that Boarding Attack to a Slash.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique • Heroic • Loyal When hiring Valgard, you may pay an additional 3 Influence to give him the trait: Lærdom 1 and +2 Influence until the end of the game.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Crimson Rogers

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced • Unique • Loyal Swordsman +2 (Volta inflicts 2 extra hits during Boarding Attacks) React: Tack your Captain when another Ship begins a Boarding with your Ship to cancel the Boarding. The attempting player must target one of their Crew. Play a card from your hand as a Boarding attack to begin a Duel between Volta and the targeted Crew.

property.name: Text
property.value: SEA ATTACHMENT Unique • Oath While attached to a Sea your hand size is reduced by 1. React: Tack this card and attach it to your Captain after you have hired a Crew with a printed Influence cost greater than 6. While attached to your Captain, you draw 1 extra card between rounds of a Boarding.

property.name: Text
property.value: All completed Adventures that provide printed Skill bonuses of +4 or more provide an additional +2 to the appropriate Skill(s).
